text: Koly nashi dokazy deklamuvalys聞 yim, doskonalo yasni, vony skazaly, "Tse ye prosto lyudyna shcho zakhoche vidvesty vas z shlyakhu vashi bat聞ky obozhnyuyut聞." Vony takozh skazaly, "Tsey vyhotovlyayut聞sya brekhnya." Tsey khto disbelieved takozh skazanyy pro pravdu shcho prybuv yim, "Tse ye ochevydno mahichne
